experiences.description: Full Bleed: A Journal of Art & Design Journal published by MICA, designed and edited by students. Film Branding project, collaborated with film major MFA students. Worked on the design of visual identity including posters, EPK and website design.

experiences.description: Designed a specific visual identity for the American Express Centurion Card, including the typography, packaging, and the display of the card.
Created a branding image with a theme of "Solitude". Included an expanded concept, design for a logo and visual identity. Organized and assigned tasks to each member for completion of their work.
experiences.title: Design Project Group Leader
